# trss-card

The card component shows a title, optional image, description, and can be linked to somewhere else.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                              | Type     | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `header`   | `header`    | The text for the headline of the card.   | `string` | `undefined` |
| `imageAlt` | `image-alt` | The alternative text for the card image. | `string` | `undefined` |
| `imageUrl` | `image-url` | The image included in the card.          | `string` | `undefined` |
